title: INCREDIBLE HYPNOTIC JOURNEY: PART 3 - LAUGHING CRISIS (NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS)
description:
This is the third part of this video. You can watch the previous video here: https://youtu.be/42lB1fbn3n8 This girl is a student of Dr. Paret who was hypnotized with the power of the gaze - fascination. She went into a hypnotic crisis. The crisis is a state that liberates us deeply. It heals our emotions. She could no longer control her emotions and begins to laugh. After the crisis is over. She feels deeply liberated and free. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
